direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve margin fee data but for different types of margin accounts (isolated vs. cross).
Both methods involve querying data related to isolated margin accounts with similar parameter handling and request structures.
Both methods interact with margin account settings and leverage adjustments, though they serve different purposes.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the margin account is a prerequisite for querying margin data.
Setting up the environment is necessary before making requests to the margin API.
Both methods involve verifying and handling margin data, making it useful for assertions.
